name: vscode-navigate-edit-history
description: Navigate your edit history with ease. Jump one step back with a keypress or view a list of all recent edits.

navigateEditHistory.maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of entries for the edits history.

navigateEditHistory.centerOnReveal.description: When navigating to an edit outside the view, should we always put the edit in the center of the screen?

navigateEditHistory.groupEditsWithinLine.description: Group edits if they are within a certain amount of lines from each other.

navigateEditHistory.logDebug.description: Log a bunch of stuff to the console. Use if submitting a bug report.

navigateEditHistory.topStackWhenQuickPic.description: Move edit to top of stack on quick pick select.

navigateEditHistory.topStackWhenMove.description: Move edit to top of stack on cursor position change.

navigateEditHistory.filterOnPathInEditLi.description: When filtering the edit list, also match on the file path.

markdownEnumDescriptions: SVG rectangle on the left, the key gutterIconPathExt support relative/absolute
SVG triangle on the left, the key gutterIconPathExt support relative/absolute
Set your own style by marker JSONCustom
navigateEditHistory.markerStyle.markdownDescription: Marker Style, you can define JSON `#navigateEditHistory.markerJSONCustom#` by yourself, SVG maybe has conflict with breakpoint [Issue](https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode/issues/5923)

navigateEditHistory.markerColor.markdownDescription: Such as #FF00FF99, not worked in SVG, you can define JSON `#navigateEditHistory.markerJSONCustom#` by yourself, see the [theme-color](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color)

navigateEditHistory.markerJSON.markdownDescription: Current marker style's JSON, it is readonly and for custom reference, custom key(gutterIconPathExt) support relative/absolute SVG path

navigateEditHistory.markerJSONCustom.markdownDescription: The custom marker style's JSON, see the `#navigateEditHistory.markerJSON#` and [DecorationRenderOptions](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions)

navigateEditHistory.markerWholeLine.markdownDescription: Whethe marker the whole line, you can define JSON `#navigateEditHistory.markerJSON#` by yourself.

commands.title: Edits: Navigate back in edit history
Edits: Navigate forward in edit history
Edits: Navigate back in edit history in the current file
Edits: Navigate forward in edit history in the current file
Edits: List edit history in all files
Edits: Create edit at cursor position (Moves edit to top of stack)
Edits: Remove any edits on the current line
Edits: Toggle any edits on the current line
Edtis: Cancel navigate back in edit history and return to starting position

scripts.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
